title: After 3 years of playing, I can't make myself login to the game anymore.....
body: because of how amazing the login music is.

replies.body: https://cdn.meme.am/instances/400x/59034286.jpg
heu
i managed to get perma banned because a 4 man premade was trolling me, feelsbadman D:

that was random.

I've had instances where 4 man premades bullied me, and I was ready to go boom.

All I do is go afk. I don't have to deal with them, and one afk game doesn't really get you punished/banned.

Heh. 4 man premades harass me? I just confuse them.

"Wtf Shen you suck."
{{champion:98}} "Thank you."
"/all Report Shen for toxic."

Enemy team hurt itself in confusion :C
If I get those 4 man premade trolls, then I just mute them all and try to have a decent conversation in all chat with the enemy team lol

lol i did that once. me and their top laner where just chiling all game. i sat there and let the gnar farm while we where chit chatting about the new pokemon game thats coming out and had a grand old time. their jungler diddnt even gank me it was great. Had an adc teemo, support yasuo mid vayne and jungle lux. In gold. and they all had smite and the same team tag and where feeding horiffically. Gnar even had the gentleman skin. What a game lul. They won 47 to 11. I was 0/0/0 and the gnar was 6/0/0 from killing attempted gankers other than that we did nothing but chill lol

lmao dude thats what i do

tbh sometimes i manage to put in some sarcasm 

like when the 4man premade been troling me all game i backdoor first inhab turret of the game badicly putting us on the spot we want to be to win the game


report shaco for no nexus
I mute all of them and make my 11 year old sister play, at least then they have a reason to flame me.  I have to leave the room though, even _**I**_ am not immune to my sister's meconocks.
can confirm from a smurf that 2 disconnects separated by about a week gets you low priority queued though.
r u saying if i get disconnected today and next week i will get shit team mates ?
You'll get the same teammates you always got, you'll just have to wait 5 minutes to get them.
Thats funny cuz i played with a 4 man premade and got 2 of them banned. Got 2 reports back to back on players being punished thanks to my report. {{champion:75}}  +6 times 2 this right here.

how do you know its that person you see im not an ashole i think

if your bad and feed il tell you dont worry bro ul learn i might give you some tips but i wil not flame or report you 

if i gank your lane and pinged you but you just sat back and chilled im anoyed sure but w/e i wont report you

i will how ever report you if your herassing me or annyone else in our team there is no excuse for this
or if you purposely die allot

but ive had some games and ive had people say stuf like they report me while they where being toxic il wisely shut up dont argu and report you end game while you keep on behaving toxicly

ive had like 5/8 of those games and get 1 report back to me that a player has been punished do i do get a small feeling of justice 

i have no clue rather it was the guy who kept ragin at his team herassing them the first game cause they did bad

or if it was the adc that kept spamming chat with report suport cause the suport died for first blood 

or anny of the other hopeless causes that behaved like this

If you could put it in an updated download of Warsongs.. that'd be great. I loop Warsongs when I play!

That sounds awesome! 
I have wanted to have so many login screen songs on my playlist for so long 
It would be a dream come true!
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Riot uploads virtually all the music they make on the League soundcloud page where you can download it for free. https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends
So, sub beats dub again?
subs > dubs always mang
Nah.
no u
yas all the way lel subs are always better

Disclaimer: I have been singing in choirs (school and college) since I was able to sing, so I know my music.

I enjoyed the English version over the Japanese. The Japanese one is fantastic, but, in my opinion, doesn't stand out from any normal anime opening (assuming that any anime opening is "normal").
On the other hand I enjoyed the English one more for its musicality. Whoever composed it did a phenomenal job. The F# C# E B from background vocals at 0:09 to 0:11 made me instantly sold me on this version (i'm a sucker for any choral parts, also why I loved Jhin's video). Also, I feel like this version is more... astrologically? I feel like if fits the theme better.

Remember this is just my opinion and should not be taken as an offense to anyone who likes the Japanese one more.

That's some cool way to read stuff - you like one version over the other because you understand more of it :3 

Don't apologize for having your own opinion, you own it mang!

My problem was I just couldnt.
I wanted to play and enjoy this game again but I wasnt able to
I wanted to feel that rush when you make that epic play, I wanted to meet some new buddies, I wanted to sit down and have a gg again, but it just wasnt there.

Then I paid my internet bill.
and then they still give you internet that disconnects every 3 days  :'(

This happened to me during Diana's release, as it was the first time Riot had ever really done anything like it.
I loved the Jhin and Taliyah themes. So good.
Only Kindred's login theme tops this one IMO
